DataElement.preferredName: Activity Card Sort Low-Demand Leisure Activities Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the total score for the Low Demand Leisure Activities section of the Activity Card Sort.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Activity Card Sort Low-Demand Leisure Activities Domain Total Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An assessment tool developed to measure levels of activity engagement in older adults. Participants sort cards depicting people engaged in various activities into categories representing whether the activity is part of the individual's routine._A domain of the Activity Card Sort (ACS) related to low-physical-demand leisure activities that may be part of an individual's routine such as puzzles, quilting, and photography._The sum of a set of numeric values.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An assessment tool developed to measure levels of activity engagement in older adults. Participants sort cards depicting people engaged in various activities into categories representing whether the activity is part of the individual's routine.

Concepts.definition: An assessment tool developed to measure levels of activity engagement in older adults. Participants sort cards depicting people engaged in various activities into categories representing whether the activity is part of the individual's routine.

The sum of a set of numeric values.
